models

Class IntTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.GenericTile
      • models.IntTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class IntTile
extends GenericTile
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Integer Tile. Represents a tile which values are integer. Destined to be used in a 15-puzzle game. Extends GenericTile. The tiles are numbered from 1 to 15. The empty tile is represented as a IntTale with value 0.

        public IntTile(java.lang.Integer value,
               boolean ordered)
        throws tools.InvariantBrokenException
        Class constructor. Constructs a IntTile.
        Parameters:
        value - assigned to the tile.
        ordered - indicates whether the tile is in the right position.
        Throws:
        tools.InvariantBrokenException - if the value is smaller than MIN or greater that MAX.
